BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor
Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Civil and Human Rights

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to reporting of pay and employment equity data
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Reporting of pay and employment equity data.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to amending the New York city charter, to create an office of diversity and inclusion within the department of citywide administrative services
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Create an office of diversity and inclusion within the department of citywide administrative services.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to requiring the equal employment practices commission to analyze and report annually on citywide racial and ethnic classification underutilization
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the equal employment practices commission to analyze and report annually on citywide racial and ethnic classification underutilization.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to requiring the department of citywide administrative services to review and report annually on the city’s efforts to collect racial and ethnic demographic information, including a review of racial classification categories and employee response rates
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring DCAS to review and report annually on the city’s efforts to collect racial and ethnic demographic information, including a review of racial classification categories and employee response rates.

A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to reporting of pay and employment equity data
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
